long_description: Stabilize beginners and keep their tips from getting too spread out with this tip clip that easily attaches to ski tips with hook-and-loop. Simply apply adhesive hook-and-loop to the ski and wrap with Tip Clip. No screws to permanently damage or slip from ski. Features quick-release clip for greater mobility.
short_description: Stabilize beginners and keep their tips from getting too spread out with this tip clip that easily attaches to ski tips with hook-and-loop.
